net.sf.json.util

类 JSONBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.json.util.JSONBuilder
  • 直接已知子类:
    JSONStringer

    public class JSONBuilder
extends Object
    JSONBuilder provides a quick and convenient way of producing JSON text. The texts produced strictly conform to JSON syntax rules. No whitespace is added, so the results are ready for transmission or storage. Each instance of JSONWriter can produce one JSON text.

    A JSONBuilder instance provides a value method for appending values to the text, and a key method for adding keys before values in objects. There are array and endArray methods that make and bound array values, and object and endObject methods which make and bound object values. All of these methods return the JSONBuilder instance, permitting a cascade style. For example, 

     new JSONBuilder(myWriter)
     .object()
         .key("JSON")
         .value("Hello, World!")
     .endObject();
    which writes 
     {"JSON":"Hello, World!"}

    The first method called must be array or object. There are no methods for adding commas or colons. JSONBuilder adds them for you. Objects and arrays can be nested up to 20 levels deep.

    This can sometimes be easier than using a JSONObject to build a string.

    版本:
    1
    作者:
    JSON.org

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      JSONBuilder(Writer w)
      Make a fresh JSONBuilder.

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      JSONBuilder array()
      Begin appending a new array.
      JSONBuilder endArray()
      End an array.
      JSONBuilder endObject()
      End an object.
      JSONBuilder key(String s)
      Append a key.
      JSONBuilder object()
      Begin appending a new object.
      JSONBuilder value(boolean b)
      Append either the value true or the value false.
      JSONBuilder value(double d)
      Append a double value.
      JSONBuilder value(long l)
      Append a long value.
      JSONBuilder value(Object o)
      Append an object value.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • JSONBuilder

        public JSONBuilder(Writer w)
        Make a fresh JSONBuilder. It can be used to build one JSON text.

    • 方法详细资料

      • array

        public JSONBuilder array()
        Begin appending a new array. All values until the balancing endArray will be appended to this array. The endArray method must be called to mark the array's end.
        返回:
        this
        抛出:
        JSONException - If the nesting is too deep, or if the object is started in the wrong place (for example as a key or after the end of the outermost array or object).

      • endArray

        public JSONBuilder endArray()
        End an array. This method most be called to balance calls to array.
        返回:
        this
        抛出:
        JSONException - If incorrectly nested.

      • endObject

        public JSONBuilder endObject()
        End an object. This method most be called to balance calls to object.
        返回:
        this
        抛出:
        JSONException - If incorrectly nested.

      • key

        public JSONBuilder key(String s)
        Append a key. The key will be associated with the next value. In an object, every value must be preceded by a key.
        参数:
        s - A key string.
        返回:
        this
        抛出:
        JSONException - If the key is out of place. For example, keys do not belong in arrays or if the key is null.

      • object

        public JSONBuilder object()
        Begin appending a new object. All keys and values until the balancing endObject will be appended to this object. The endObject method must be called to mark the object's end.
        返回:
        this
        抛出:
        JSONException - If the nesting is too deep, or if the object is started in the wrong place (for example as a key or after the end of the outermost array or object).

      • value

        public JSONBuilder value(boolean b)
        Append either the value true or the value false.
        参数:
        b - A boolean.
        返回:
        this
        抛出:
        JSONException

      • value

        public JSONBuilder value(double d)
        Append a double value.
        参数:
        d - A double.
        返回:
        this
        抛出:
        JSONException - If the number is not finite.

      • value

        public JSONBuilder value(long l)
        Append a long value.
        参数:
        l - A long.
        返回:
        this
        抛出:
        JSONException

      • value

        public JSONBuilder value(Object o)
        Append an object value.
        参数:
        o - The object to append. It can be null, or a Boolean, Number, String, JSONObject, or JSONArray, or an object with a toJSONString() method.
        返回:
        this
        抛出:
        JSONException - If the value is out of sequence.
